job_title: Too Small of An Agency to Post in Kotzebue, AK
pros: Endless opportunities for growth.  They pay for your NCE study materials, fees and even flight and hotel to the test site!  They will support you in your particular therapeutic method.  Open to ideas and contributions. Opportunities for cultural experiences.  Fishing and hunting is great.  Northern lights.  Get up close and personal with Alaska State Troopers.
cons: No roads in or out.  Expensive.  Political in the whole agency, but not in the behavioral health department.
